Naārammaṇa
Parāmāsagocchaka
Parāmāsaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
6.
2137Parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  parāmāsaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
2138Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  noparāmāse khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (Yāva asaññasattā.) (1)
2139Parāmāsañca noparāmāsañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  parāmāsañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
